message.content:
cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.LG, cs.SY, cs.CR. 

The paper deals with an active perception problem in which an autonomous agent interacts with a potentially adversarial agent. This involves modeling uncertainty and adversary behavior, which are common topics in artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and robotics (cs.RO). The paper also proposes a deep reinforcement learning approach, which falls under the category of machine learning (cs.LG). The problem formulation involves decision-making under uncertainty, which is a topic in control systems (cs.SY). Finally, the paper deals with adversarial scenarios, which is a topic in computer security (cs.CR).
